page.title: 12BENINGTON SCHOOL (3)
page.content: The classes are of mixed sex and mixed ability. The educational stress is on individual progress and attainment. The school has its own Library. It encour- ages Musical prowess, and Concerts are regularly held. There is an annual Christmas Fair and at Harvest Festival there is a Food Collection. This is parcelled and taken to Â£The Bell' where it is auctioned and the money donated to help the Old Folk. There are several active School Clubs. The School keeps pigs, goats and dogs and cats freely roam.The Curriculum is that of a normal J.M.I. school,and the children play the normal games,ie.football,netball,crick- et,rounders and athletics and also take part in matches with other schools in the area. (Cont.)
